DOC.detailed_description: After successful screening , eligible patient randomly allocate one two study arm , either receive MYL-1401H Neulasta . Randomization 2:1 MYL-1401H Neulasta , respectively . Subjects receive first six cycle background therapy ( Docetaxel , Doxorubicin , Cyclophosphamide [ TAC ] ) day 1 . Treatment study drug ( either MYL-1401H Neulasta ) schedule Day 2 cycle , least 24 hour chemotherapy administration . Duration cycle 3 week . Follow-up visit schedule 24 week first administration study drug .
